channel.title: Homes on Anh Hoang Duc
channel.description: Recent content in Homes on Anh Hoang Duc

item.description: About me My name is Anh Hoang Duc, a Business Analytics professional from Hanoi, Vietnam. I have a background in Quantitative Methods in Economics & am a co-founder of Ranalytics.vn, a group of data-addicted R users specializing in data analytics with the dream to bring the power of R & analytics to Vietnam. I am also an instructor of RStudio & Datacamp in Vietnam, providing various aspects of R such as data analysis, data wrangling, data vizualization or predictive modelling with R.

item.title: Projects
item.description: Some selected interesting projects that I have done with my fantastic team

item.title: Teaching
item.description: I am teaching some R courses with Ranalytics: Data analysis with R - in Vietnamese Basic introduction to R in Vietnamese - Datacamp course Recently, I have joined some conferences and workshops. During which, I am very happy to share my experience building analytics capabilities & implementations for attendees from different backgrounds. Human Resources Development Fund (HRDF) Conference, Kuala Lumpur, Malaysia (19 Mar, 2018) Next BigTech Asia Conference/Workshop, Kuala Lumpur, Malaysia (12-16 Mar, 2018) R users meetup - Experience sharing about Business Analytics (Mar, 2017)

item.title: Shiny apps
item.description: Apart from my work, I really enjoy my time to create shiny apps to automate some common analysis problems for my team, some of them are as follows: Market basket analysis Customers segmentation with RFM
